mapper.select: select * from supplier a where a.id = #{id} and status!=-1 limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into supplier ( name, supplier_type, interface_type, is_direct_supplied, status, version, create_time, update_time, special_commission_switch ) values ( #{propInfo.name}, #{propInfo.supplierType}, #{propInfo.interfaceType}, #{propInfo.directSupplied}, #{propInfo.operationType}, #{propInfo.bargainedPrice}, #{status}, #{version}, now(), now(), #{bizInfo.orderBizConfig.specialCommissionSwitch} )
